post.body: lively friday evening, eh?
it's actually FLAT here!
I ordered from Raj, and to me the CTM was on par with FOI - pretty good, but didn't blow my socks off. Works in a pinch, tho.
congratulations!! may the web orders be plentiful!! :)
@info_monger I could totally see vegan poutine: roasted garlic potatoes, baked marinated tofu, smothered in mushroom gravy. yum.
sympathies on the shingles -- hopefully there's something you can take for the itching/pain!
only if you have gout.
true. and the cops pulling over downhill speeders in front of my bedroom window. fun!!
@ooocanada virtual cheers!! (new coined term: libeerians!)
dude, what happened?
Ok, if you were my bike rack bag, where would you be? (I know that the answer is not "plastic flip top" although its the logical choice).
got the bicycle ready for getting around town ... and the weather is turning to crap for the next week. hanging out, hunkering down.
just discovered delivery indian food. this could be dangerous.
chilly am, couldn't find my watchcap, so put on my santa hat instead. I think there's parabolic heater in my future.
back home, after meditation and cupcakes.
i think that I shall never see / a food as lovely as kimchi.
correction: the edible things in the kitchen.
having one of those days where i want to eat everything in the kitchen.
mmm. costco kimchi. who knew?
home now -- good seeing everyone!! must remember the art of the disco nap for next time, though.
wifi at the laundromat (whoo!) followed by errands, floor cleaning and (now that I'm settled in), some social fun.
is finally starting to relax.
yay heat!! so happy.
well, I was going to complain because it's 35 degrees - then I checked seattle (19) and missoula (-11). Nevermind.
man, i can't wait until i have heat in this freaking apartment. (repairman comes by tuesday am).
rain, the great demotivator. wondering how i ever got anything done in Seattle.
wow, i slept in late.
happiness trifecta: heat, comfy seating, and audio cord that reaches all the way from speakers to laptop-on-lap-on-couch.
